headline.print_headline: Lawsuit: Ohio Feud Has Led to Botched Death Probes
headline.main: Lawsuit: Ohio Feud Has Led to Botched Death Probes

lead_paragraph: A southern Ohio coroner is accused in a lawsuit of using deaths as a political pawn in a feud with the local sheriff, disrespecting bodies and abandoning important evidence, and as a result, keeping one Ohio family from ever knowing whether a loved one was killed or committed suicide.
